revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: On the 19th of November last, I wrote an official letter to W. G. Irwin, Esq. of Atlanta, and forwarded the same by mail. It has come back to me from the dead-letter office.—There may have been some mistake in the direction. Will you read my letter which I enclose to you, and if you can identify the individual to whom it should go, will you be kind enough to send it to him. Otherwise, please return it to me.
